SELECT ssa.*, ssav.id vid, ssav.`sale_attr_value_name` FROM spu_sale_attr ssa LEFT JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssa.`spu_id`=ssav.`spu_id` AND ssa.`base_sale_attr_id`=ssav.`base_sale_attr_id`
WHERE ssa.`spu_id`=#{spuId} ORDER BY ssa.`id`,ssav.`id`

SELECT a.sku_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY sale_attr_value_id ASC SEPARATOR "|") AS value_json FROM(SELECT si.id sku_id, skuav.id vid, skuav.spu_id, skuav.sale_attr_value_id, spuav.base_sale_attr_id FROM `sku_info` si LEFT JOIN `sku_sale_attr_value` skuav ON si.id = skuav.sku_id LEFT JOIN `spu_sale_attr_value` spuav ON skuav.sale_attr_value_id=spuav.id WHERE si.spu_id=#{spuId} ORDER BY si.id,spuav.`base_sale_attr_id`,skuav.`sale_attr_value_id`) a GROUP BY a.sku_id
